column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Visiting and was looking for a local steakhouse. Shared the shrimp cocktail
column4: and brussel sprouts. The food was delicious
column5: had to talk myself into the salted carmel ice cream with hot fudge but glad I didnt skip dessert. The lighting was a bit dim and the music was a bit loud
column6: but Brandon our waitor was very attentive without being annoying.
